name: Cluck Cluck-Boom
description:
This is a simple catch them if you can game for Win64 OS.  The only Objective is to catch all the Easter Eggs the Deranged Roster has stolen from the Easter Bunny,  Being angry that the Bunny has got all the eggs he stole them.  He has loaded them up with explosives and is set to burn down the forest. Can you save the forest?

There are 10 levels to get past, of ever faster paced catching of the Easter Eggs
